summary: A small weapon mod that adds a out of the way sword that will kill every thing in one hit.
descriptionHtml:
I made this because I saw the Excalibur easter egg and I wanted to make my own. It is in a different location then the easter egg and it is way more powerful. There is not marker on the map for it.

One-Handed steel sword. Silver will be coming in the future.

Hint: It is in area where Whiterun Owns. 

I would also like to thank  charon711 for telling me about King Aurther I had it messed up so I have re-named the title but the sword will keep its name.

Please note that this is my first mod so if there are any problems please tell me.

Future Updates:
- Weaker more lore friendly version.
- Silver version.
- Silver more lore friendly version.

[UPDATE LOG]
1.0 - Added Mod
author: JAJAY797
